languages.text: "Целое заведение, посвященное непродуктивным и паразитическим способам времяпрепровождения. Напрасная трата площади станции".
"An entire establishment dedicated to unproductive and parasitical pursuits. A waste of station space."
languages.original_text: "Целое заведение, посвященное непродуктивным и паразитическим способам времяпрепровождения. Напрасная трата площади станции".

traits.locale_text: "An entire establishment dedicated to unproductive and parasitical pursuits. A waste of station space."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "An entire establishment dedicated to unproductive and parasitical pursuits. A waste of station space."

traits.locale_text: "An entire establishment dedicated to unproductive and parasitical pursuits. A waste of station space."

traits.locale_text: "An entire establishment dedicated to unproductive and parasitical pursuits. A waste of station space."

languages.text: “整座机构都在致力于非生产性、寄生性的追求，这完全是在浪费星站的空间。”
languages.original_text: "An entire establishment dedicated to unproductive and parasitical pursuits. A waste of station space."

traits.locale_text: “整座机构都在致力于非生产性、寄生性的追求，这完全是在浪费星站的空间。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Todo un establecimiento dedicado a fines no productivos y parasitarios. Es un desperdicio del espacio de la estación».
languages.original_text: "An entire establishment dedicated to unproductive and parasitical pursuits. A waste of station space."

traits.locale_text: «Todo un establecimiento dedicado a fines no productivos y parasitarios. Es un desperdicio del espacio de la estación».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「非生産的で寄生的な行いに特化した施設です。ステーションスペースの無駄遣いといえましょう」
languages.original_text: "An entire establishment dedicated to unproductive and parasitical pursuits. A waste of station space."

traits.locale_text: 「非生産的で寄生的な行いに特化した施設です。ステーションスペースの無駄遣いといえましょう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Eine Einrichtung für unproduktive und parasitäre Aktivitäten. Eine Verschwendung von Stationskapazität!"
languages.original_text: "An entire establishment dedicated to unproductive and parasitical pursuits. A waste of station space."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Einrichtung für unproduktive und parasitäre Aktivitäten. Eine Verschwendung von Stationskapazität!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Un établissement entièrement dédié à des activités futiles et parasites... Quelle perte d'espace. »
languages.original_text: "An entire establishment dedicated to unproductive and parasitical pursuits. A waste of station space."

traits.locale_text: « Un établissement entièrement dédié à des activités futiles et parasites... Quelle perte d'espace. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Verimsiz ve asalakça meşgalelere adanmış koskoca bir yapı. İstasyon alanı israfı."
languages.original_text: "An entire establishment dedicated to unproductive and parasitical pursuits. A waste of station space."

traits.locale_text: "Kaynakları parazit gibi sömürmeye adanmış, verimsiz, koskoca bir yapı. İstasyonun boşa harcadığı bir alan."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "An entire establishment dedicated to unproductive and parasitical pursuits. A waste of station space."
